オプション1:
While keeping an eye on the cube‑shaped monsters,
after about three hours of walking,
sitting, and walking again, Star Man could no longer walk from exhaustion.

As he sat unable to move, Star Man spotted
something moving on a distant rock.
Looking closely, it seemed to be two children.

"Hey!"
Star Man waved and headed toward the children.

The children stayed seated where they were,
whispering to each other.
